rule.name: X-Auto-Response-Suppress
rule.description: Exclude Auto-Reply emails using X-Auto-Response-Suppress header

rule.name: Auto-Reply Auto-Submitted
rule.description: Exclude Auto-Reply emails using Auto-Submitted header

rule.name: Multiple users: assign to the first
Device update (by mac+ifnumber not restricted port)
Device update (by ip+ifdescr not restricted port)
Update only mac address (mac on switch port)
Import only mac address (mac on switch port)
Copia de Computer update (by serial + uuid)
